definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale

sentences.english: Melon's skin is thin, only about one-third of thick watermelon rind.
sentences.chinese: 哈密瓜的皮很薄，大约只有西瓜皮的三分之一厚。

sentences.english: The barber looks around the shop and says, "About 2 hours."
sentences.chinese: 理发室看了看四周，说，“大约两个小时。”

sentences.english: Around the 4th century AD, the site of the Oita city was once called "Bungo".
sentences.chinese: 大约在公元4世纪，大分市所在地域便被称为丰后国。

sentences.english: I am going to Haverhill to-morrow, surveying, for a week or more.
sentences.chinese: 我明天要去黑佛希尔测量，大约得一个多星期。

sentences.english: After going only a mile or so, they realized they had forgotten the milking stools.
sentences.chinese: 走了大约一英里，他们发现挤奶用的凳子忘记拿了。

sentences.english: At about half the distance to Zunyi, I came across a long line of cars.
sentences.chinese: 大约在去遵义的半道上我碰上了一串车排起了长龙。
这个过程大约需要14至48个小时。

sentences.english: I'll come walking with you in an hour or so.
sentences.chinese: 我大约一个钟头以后就来陪你散步。

sentences.english: Its length is approximately is 4180 miles.
Twenty years ago roughly ten boys were arrested for assault for every one girl.
sentences.chinese: 二十年前，只有大约十个男孩因殴打一个女孩被逮捕。

sentences.english: Galanz just about a week ago and the National US-held section of microwave ovens .
sentences.chinese: 格兰仕大约一周前刚刚与国美合作举行微波炉节。

sentences.english: How much is a pair of anti-reflection lenses?
sentences.chinese: 一对不反光镜片大约要多少钱？

sentences.english: By the Song Dynasty some seven centuries later, the porcelain industry was flourishing.
sentences.chinese: 宋代，大约七世纪后，是瓷业最繁荣的时期。

sentences.english: Modrikamen has demanded a deal that values Fortis shares at about 7 euros.
sentences.chinese: 他已要求对富通作价每股大约7欧元。

sentences.english: Female tigers in the wild can live up to 15 years averagely.
sentences.chinese: 野生雌虎的寿命大约是15年，平均能产下5窝虎仔。

definition: almost/nearly/more or less/about the same/good enough/not bad
